Customer Reviews

You can earn rewards points for writing a review.

Simply wonderful 5

This completly worth the money spended, is simply incredible how they could do it again and even better. I loved the first edition but I loved even more this one! The trial version of Final Fantasy XIII amazed me a lot also! Another good one for Square Enix!

people found this helpful

2009/05/11 [Miss Aria] MEXICO

Truly Complete. 5

Truly amazing. The added scenes are integrated so efficiently and I'm glad they added an English dub to the extra scenes also. Advent Children in HD, or rather Blu-Ray ("Beyond High Definition" as the motto goes) is unforgettable. Add that to the Trial Version of FFXIII, this set is a must have! You won't be sorry if you buy it.

people found this helpful

2009/05/02 [-] UNITED KINGDOM

The best movie ever 5

I just received my copy, and it's great... It has new scenes of the movie and the extras are also good... I bought 3 copies for me a 2 friends and they are also delighted by the movie... and the HD makes it greater than the DVD... I recomend 1000000% the purchase of this piece of digital art... the demo it's playable and it's worth to have it. A MUST HAVE FOR FF & ANIME FANS.
